question: How do you make sure that your clients remain loyal and satisfied with the quality of the 'merchandise' they receive?

I run a tight operation. My clients are wealthy, powerful, and desperate. They can’t afford to be seen with this kind of thing. So I handle everything discreetly—no paper trails, no faces, no risks. This isn’t about morality. It’s about control. And in this world, control is everything.
